## Source: ossf-package-analysis (dc05fb08e4b8eb3adc20c8ac44ecf4800fa3f3e8bc0ac2f19f397485bc91b79c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ic-flows-platform' @ 91.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
